title: Social Media Specialist – Real Estate Coaching Content
job_overview:
Helping real estate agents grow their business with modern marketing, systems, and 10X coaching.
Create daily content that speaks to realtors and brokers
Promote coaching programs, real estate tips, and success stories
Build branded Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and YouTube Shorts content
Use GoHighLevel to automate email funnels, post scheduling, lead capture, and call booking
Repurpose long-form training into bite-sized social pieces

???? Ideal For You If You:
Understand real estate language (MLS, leads, listings, commissions)
Love motivating and educating professionals
Know Canva, CapCut, and Meta Business Suite
Willing to Learn BoldTrail CRM system 
?? Fluent in English (spoken and written)
?? Reliable high-speed internet (minimum 20 Mbps)
?? Proficient in GoHighLevel (GHL)
?? Experience in content creation and social media management
?? Self-motivated and able to manage deadlines
?? Familiarity with Canva, CapCut
?? Social platform experience: Facebook, IG, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, LinkedInTech Requirements:
Laptop/PC with video editing capability
Stable high-speed internet (screenshot of speed test required)
Quiet workspace with mic/headset for occasional Zoom calls
Responsibilities:
Create and schedule engaging posts across multiple platforms
Build and manage content calendars for 1 or more brands
Write captions, CTAs, hooks, and short-form video scripts
Edit reels/short videos (we’ll provide footage when needed)
Track analytics and optimize for reach & conversions

Use GoHighLevel to:
Have GoHighLevel experience with workflows, triggers, and pipelines
Automate posts, emails, and workflows, Manage campaigns and funnels, Connect lead capture forms and calendars

Collaborate with our U.S.-based team weekly via Zoom
